r.d: This is a DataSource driver for Structures_DataGrid using PEAR::DB_DataObject.
r.n: QA release Directory layout - bug #12942: datasource sorting now overrides the dataobject sort property (thanks to Mike Rehacek) - fixed limit() when called with a single argument (Warning: this might cause a BC break if you're using this datasource outside of Structures_DataGrid) - bugÂ #13199: support DB_DataObject getters in addition to pure camel-case ones (thanks to Mads Lie Jensen)
